turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey would you fetch me a coffee from Starbucks please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks should I go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in at 87a Stony Hill Road in Bethel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to try a Caramel Brulee Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of milk do you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like almond milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I'd like whipped cream and extra caramel brulee topping please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it hot and make sure they put a sleeve on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay you want a grande caramel brulee latte made with almond milk, whipped cream, hot, extra caramel brulee topping and a sleeve from the Stony Hill Road location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you'd like me to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No but make sure they put a splash guard in the lid.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will ask for a splash guard.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it, order is in and I will get it to you in just a few minutes, you will get the receipt in a text message.
